generated.html:
<script>var randomNumber = Math.random();
randomNumber = randomNumber * 1000 + 1;
randomNumber = Math.floor(randomNumber);
var playOrNot = prompt("Do you want to play a guessing game?");
var numGuesses = 15;
if (playOrNot.toLowerCase() === "yes") {
  var inputNumber = prompt("You have 15 tries to guess a random number between 1 and 1000. Guess number 1. What is your first guess?");
  for (var i = 0; i < numGuesses; i++) {
    if (isNaN(Number(inputNumber))) {
      inputNumber = prompt("Not a number! Try again.");
    } else if (inputNumber == randomNumber) {
      alert("You have guessed the correct number!");
      break;
    } else if (inputNumber > randomNumber) {
      inputNumber = prompt("Too high! Guess number ".concat(i + 2, ". What is your next guess?"));
    } else if (inputNumber < randomNumber) {
      inputNumber = prompt("Too low! Guess number ".concat(i + 2, ". What is your next guess?"));
    }
    if (i === numGuesses - 1) {
      alert("You have run out of tries! The number was ".concat(randomNumber, ". Better luck next time!"));
      break;
    }
  }
} else if (playOrNot.toLowerCase() === "no") {
  alert("Okay. Bye!");
}</script>
